name: My Name Was Changed Today
description:
It's been about 30 minutes since my name change hearing was held. It hasn't really hit me yet, but this is the biggest step I've had in my transition since the pandemic hit.

For Kay, who helped me pay for it, I love you so much.

I wrote each segment of text as it was happening in real time, so this is how I really felt in the minutes leading up to it.

No sound, due to lazy.
